biotools.summary: Suite of applications for building and manipulating the Burrows-Wheeler Transform (BWT) of collections of DNA sequences. The algorithms employed are intended to scale to collections of sequences containing one billion entries or more.

bioschemas.name: BEETL
bioschemas.summary: Suite of applications for building and manipulating the Burrows-Wheeler Transform (BWT) of collections of DNA sequences. The algorithms employed are intended to scale to collections of sequences containing one billion entries or more.
